    Cols
    Welcome! I am currently a PhD candidate in the Department of Economics at Rice University, with an anticipated graduation date of May 2025.

    My research fields are econometrics, program evaluation, network economics, and health economics.

    Feel free to reach out to me at: siwon.ryu@rice.edu
